div.p: Defines the type of entity described in the EAC-CPF instance.
Defines the type of function described in the EAF instance
Required attribute within the entityType element that defines the type of entity described in the EAC-CPF instance.
Required attribute within the functionType element that defines the type of function described in the EAF instance.
activity, business process, function, other, subfunction, task, transaction
